search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Kanban Tool (kanbantool.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Kanban Tool is: [https://kanbantool.com/pricing](https://kanbantool.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Free Trial & Pricing | Kanban Tool – Online and On-Site Kanban Software ...

extracted_content.content:

All plans include: real-time board updates, advanced Kanban board analytics and all other features.  
No extra fees, no credit card required for trial. You can upgrade, downgrade or cancel at any time.

[Kanban Tool On-Site](https://kanbantool.com/kanban-tool-on-site) new - Enterprise solution installed on your server, available for 10+ users, annual billing.

All plans include: real-time board updates, advanced Kanban board analytics and all other features.  
No extra fees, no credit card required for trial. You can upgrade, downgrade or cancel at any time.  
Contact us directly for special volume discounts, non-profit and educational pricing.

Can't decide? [Start free trial and choose plan later.](https://kanbantool.com/signup/new)

Kanban Tool powers over 25,000 small and large businesses.  
These are just a few of Kanban Tool's happy customers:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 1: Kanban Tool customers](https://static.kanbantool.com/home/kanban-tool-customers.png)

* * *

> "Really getting value from using @kanbantool now. We have 8 boards and 48 users active tracking IT Ops tasks, order quotations & projects."

Ian Lynch

What’s included:  
Get 100+ features and integrations
-----------------------------------------------------

![Image 2: team collaboration on kanban board](https://static.kanbantool.com/pricing/real-time-team-collaboration-on-kanban-boards.png)

### Real-time team collaboration on Kanban boards

*   Easy to use drag & drop interface
*   Customizable layouts with swimlanes
*   Comments & email notifications
*   Task assignments
*   Team activity widget
*   WIP limits
*   Due date reminders
*   Real-time updates across team devices

![Image 3: board customization](https://static.kanbantool.com/pricing/kanban-board-customization.png)

### Advanced customization to suit your needs

*   Configurable workflows & board templates
*   Card templates with 15 custom fields
*   Board backgrounds and themes
*   30+ Power-Ups including: Developer Tools Power-Up
*   Well-documented API & SDK
*   Available in 9 languages

![Image 4: kanban software security](https://static.kanbantool.com/pricing/security-and-compliance.png)

### Comprehensive security & rigorous compliance

*   Advanced account access privileges
*   Single sign-on (SSO)
*   Two-factor Authentication (2FA)
*   GDPR compliant
*   99,99% service uptime over past 10 years
*   [Kanban Tool On-Site](https://kanbantool.com/kanban-tool-on-site) available (hostable on your own server)\* On-Premise
*   User Group Management Enterprise

![Image 5: power-ups for kanban board](https://static.kanbantool.com/pricing/power-ups.png)

### Add more power to your boards with [30+ Power-Ups](https://kanbantool.com/support/power-ups#what-powerups-are-available)

*   Comments, email notifications & reminders
*   Interactive calendar
*   Task dependencies
*   Card covers
*   Interactive checklists & templates
*   Developer Tools to add your own styles and scripts
*   Backgrounds and color themes

![Image 6: developer platform and integrations](https://static.kanbantool.com/pricing/developer-platform-and-integrations.png)

### Robust developer platform & third-party integrations

*   Free mobile apps (Android, iPhone & iPad apps)
*   3000+ apps with Zapier & Apiant integrations
*   Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive & Box
*   Support for CSS & JavaScript modification
*   Chromecast® integration
*   Adding tasks via email
*   Flexible & well-documented API & SDK

![Image 7: Automation in Kanban](https://static.kanbantool.com/pricing/automation-and-time-tracking.png)

### Save time with automation & time tracking

*   Process automation Enterprise
*   Recurring & postponed tasks with reminders
*   Reporting (cumulative flow diagram, breakdown charts & time reports)
*   Data import/export from Excel/CSV
*   Powerful & well-documented API & SDK
*   Seamless time tracking and reporting Enterprise

Try Kanban Tool On-Site
-----------------------

Host Kanban Tool® On-Site on your own servers and gain complete control over your data.  
Get in touch and see how we can help your organization deliver exceptional results.

### [Contact Sales](mailto:sales@kanbantool.com?subject=Kanban%20Tool%20On-site%20enquiry) [Learn more](https://kanbantool.com/kanban-tool-on-site)

Kanban Tool is an affordable online and on-premise Kanban software. Start with a 14-day free trial and create your first Kanban board in few seconds.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes options for both online and on-premise solutions. Special discounts available for volume, non-profits, and educational institutions.
